attributes.action: adopt the Euro as the currency of the UK within the next 5 years.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Euro is the right currency for the UK and it's people. The pound will not be able to fight the Euro forever. Traveling to Europe would be made easier and money would not be lost changing currency. The Euro is not the way to making Europe the same. The current Eurozone still keeps it's own identity's and the coins feature a national side which would be able to have the queens head on.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
